title: How many children applied for open choice middle school (grades 6-8) in new Hanover county? Specifically, to Roland-Grise? And how many were actually let in?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2017/04/how-many-people-applied-for-open-choice-middle-school-in-new-hanover-county-schools/
